titles.title: U.S. Ship Safety and Competitiveness Act of 1993
To provide for an exemption for certain United States flag ships from radio operator and equipment requirements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. U.S. Ship Safety and Competitiveness Act of 1993 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to exempt a U.S. ship operating in accordance with the Global Maritime Distress and Safety System provisions of the Safety Convention from radio operator and equipment requirements.
